title: Ryan ZumMallen of Trucks.com
description:
In this episode we are joined by automotive journalist Ryan ZumMallen, staff writer at Trucks.com, as well as a contributor for Road &Track, Car and Driver, and Autobytel. Ryan and Matt talk about the new, 700 HP Jeep Grand Cherokee Trackhawk, the Honda Civic Type R, and the legend that is the Lexus LFA. We also get into collectible sneakers, Ryan's personal vice, talk about how to test ski and bike racks in extreme conditions, racing Honda Odyssey's, and the 80's most garish supercars. 

 

This show is available as a video!

https://youtu.be/pTH1IqYq7dE

Follow Ryan on Twitter at: 

https://twitter.com/zoomy575m

Read Ryan's work at Trucks.com here: 

https://www.trucks.com/author/ryanzummallen/
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
